__comment: This shuffle key will make it so that it will shuffle the question. Set to true by default.

questions.text: This is how you make questions! This will be the text that the question uses.
questions.__comment: Shuffle, by default, is set to true. You don't need to put it in there if you want it to shuffle.

questions.text: Example typing question. You have to type your answer. The answers are not case sensitive.
Example number question. You have to type your answer, but it has to be a number.
